llm_res:
YES

The function `isApprovedForAll` in the provided code violates the ERC-1155 rule that it should return "True if the operator is approved, false if not." The function incorrectly returns the negation of the value stored in `_operatorApprovals[account][operator]`. This means if an operator is approved (i.e., the value is `true`), the function will return `false`, and vice versa, which is contrary to the expected behavior as per the ERC standards.
